name: Click Me (Isaacattack34)
description:
Click the button as many times as you can.  That simple.  The only hitch is that it is trying to run away.  It runs away every half a second.  Bronze is Score 50.  Silver is Score 100.  Gold is Score 250.  Platinum is Score 500.

There is a windows warning but it is because it says it is by an unknown publisher.  It says that because this is a Scratch game and I converted it by using a website.  If you want to play the original one on Scratch here is the link.  https://scratch.mit.edu/projects/782486844/
